Documentation.UserDocu: This object allows to compute the Deaves Harris Mean Wind Speed

computeMeanWindSpeed(height, terrainRoughness, shearVelocity, zeroPlanDisplacement, latitude, earthAngularVelocity, beta) height = the heigh at which the mean wind speed is calculated terrainRoughness = the terrain roughness shearVelocity = the shear velocity of the flow zeroPlanDisplacement = the zero plan displacement latitude = the latidude earthAngularVelocity = the earth angular velocity beta = the beta coefficient
